subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Bobsledding
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: There were eight crashes, including the one that led to the top Swiss driver bowing out, on the first day of the two-man training Wednesday. The event begins Saturday.
snippet: There were eight crashes, including the one that led to the top Swiss driver bowing out, on the first day of the two-man training Wednesday. The event begins Saturday.
